title: Himi 307
lyrics:
8’s & 6’s
1.
Pea ka tau ka mo’ua
‘I he ngaahi ‘ahi’ahi,
Ke tau lotu kumi,
Ke kau ‘e he Laumālie,
Ke tokoni, ‘etau vaivai,
Ke tau fa’a kātaki.
2.
Pea ke tau kole ma’u pē,
Ki he tokoni ‘i loto,
‘A e Laumālie;
Pea ke tau fa’a vakai,
Pea lotu, fai ma’u ai pē,
Ke tau mo’ui ai.
3.
Pea ke tau fa’a tokanga,
Ki he ngaahi akonaki,
’I he Tohi Tapu,
He ko e heletā ia,
‘A e Laumālie lelei,
Ke tau puke ia.
4.
Pea ke tau ‘alu ma’u pē
Pea muimui atu
Ki he Laumālie,
Pea te tau lava atu
Ki he iku’anga lelei,
Pea mālie ai. *
